item.title: [BHS][Web Hosting] - Migration Cluster051 to Cluster151
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Jan 13, 09:30 - 11:30 UTC

Dec 24, 21:12 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Web Hosting offer.

This may temporarily affect availability.

Start time : 13/01/2026 09:30 UTC
End time : 13/01/2026 11:30 UTC
Service impact : During this maintenance, cluster051 will be temporarily unavailable for 2 hours maximum.
Outgoing gateway IP will change during maintenance, please find the new one here : https://help.ovhcloud.com/csm/en-web-hosting-clusters-ip-addresses?id=kb_article_view&sysparm_article=KB0052388
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be doing a migration of cluster015 to cluster115.

Thank you for your understanding.

item.title: [GRA][Web Hosting] - Cluster100 Filerz2186 incident notification
item.description:
Jan 6, 13:29 UTC
Investigating - We are currently investigating an incident affecting our Web Hosting offering, which is causing temporary latency issue in the Filerz2186 - Cluster100.

Here are some supplementary details :

Start time : 06/01/2026 11:15 UTC
Impacted Service(s) : File server 2186 is experiencing latency on Web Hosting Cluster 100.
Customers Impact : Customers using filer servers 2186 on Cluster100 are temporarily experiencing latency when accessing their hosted websites.
Ongoing Actions : Our teams are investigating to determine the origin of the incident and fix it.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.
